testCase.expectedBehavior: Should list reports using publication_date or effective_year for 2024

function.arguments: {"query":"SELECT symbol, proper_title, title, un_body, publication_date FROM sg_reports WHERE SUBSTRING(publication_date, 1, 4) = '2024' ORDER BY publication_date;","explanation":"List all Secretary-General reports published in 2024 with key metadata."}
function.name: query_database

messages.content: {"error":"Query failed: permission denied for view sg_reports. You may retry with a corrected query. The original query was: SELECT symbol, proper_title, title, un_body, publication_date FROM sg_reports WHERE SUBSTRING(publication_date, 1, 4) = '2024' ORDER BY publication_date;"}

function.arguments: {"query":"SELECT DISTINCT entity FROM latest_versions WHERE effective_year = 2024 ORDER BY entity;","explanation":"Identify how the 'entity' field labels Secretary-General reports for 2024 to filter correctly."}
function.name: query_database

messages.content: {"error":"Query failed: permission denied for view latest_versions. You may retry with a corrected query. The original query was: SELECT DISTINCT entity FROM latest_versions WHERE effective_year = 2024 ORDER BY entity;"}

function.arguments: {"query":"SELECT symbol, proper_title, title, un_body, publication_date FROM documents WHERE SUBSTRING(publication_date, 1, 4) = '2024' AND (title ILIKE '%Secretary-General%' OR proper_title ILIKE '%Secretary-General%') ORDER BY publication_date;","explanation":"List all documents in 2024 whose title/proper_title indicates a Secretary-General report."}
function.name: query_database

args.query:
SELECT symbol, proper_title, un_body, publication_date FROM documents 
WHERE SUBSTRING(publication_date, 1, 4) = '2024'
  AND (
    proper_title ILIKE '%report of the secretary-general%'
    OR title ILIKE '%report of the secretary-general%'
    OR proper_title ILIKE '%Secretary-General’s report%'
    OR proper_title ILIKE '%Report of the Secretary-General%'
  )
ORDER BY publication_date;
args.explanation: Find all 2024 documents whose title indicates they are Secretary-General reports.

result.explanation: Find all 2024 documents whose title indicates they are Secretary-General reports.

results.finalResponse:
## Summary
Found 8 Secretary-General reports published in 2024 (per available documents). See table; can refine if you need a specific UN body or topic.

## SG reports (2024)
| Symbol | Proper Title | UN Body | Publication Date |
|---|---|---|---|
| A/79/1 | Report of the Secretary-General on the work of the Organization | General Assembly | 2024 |
| S/2023/1075 | Report of the Secretary-General on the activities of the United Nations Office for West Africa and the Sahel | Security Council | 2024-01-02 |
| S/2024/13 | Report of the Secretary-General on his mission of good offices in Cyprus | Security Council | 2024-01-03 |
| S/2024/117 | Eighteenth report of the Secretary-General on the threat posed by ISIL (Da'esh)… | Security Council | 2024-01-31 |
| E/CN.3/2024/22/CORR.1 | Report of the Secretary-General on open data : | Economic and Social Council | 2024-02-15 |
| S/2024/251 | Report of the Secretary-General on the United Nations Organization Stabilization Mission in the Democratic Republic of the Congo | Security Council | 2024-03-21 |
| S/2024/526 | Report of the Secretary-General on his mission of good offices in Cyprus | Security Council | 2024-07-05 |
| S/2024/583 | Nineteenth report of the Secretary-General on the threat posed by ISIL (Da'esh)… | Security Council | 2024-07-31 |

If you want only Security Council mission reports, or to include corrigenda/exclude them, I can adjust.

testCase.prompt: What are the most common report topics?
testCase.expectedBehavior: Should unnest subject_terms and count frequency

messages.content: What are the most common report topics?

function.arguments:
{"query":"SELECT term, COUNT(*) AS report_count
FROM (
  SELECT UNNEST(subject_terms) AS term
  FROM sg_reports
) s
GROUP BY term
ORDER BY report_count DESC, term ASC
LIMIT 10;","explanation":"Top 10 most frequent subject_terms across SG reports (2023+) to identify the most common topics."}

GROUP BY term
ORDER BY report_count DESC, term ASC
LIMIT 10;"}

ORDER BY report_count DESC, term ASC
LIMIT 10;","explanation":"Find the top 10 most frequent subject_terms among latest Secretary-General report series to identify common topics."}

function.arguments:
{"query":"SELECT term, COUNT(*) AS report_count
FROM (
  SELECT UNNEST(subject_terms) AS term
  FROM documents

    OR title ILIKE '%Secretary-General%'

function.arguments:
{"query":"SELECT term, COUNT(*) AS report_count
FROM (
  SELECT UNNEST(subject_terms) AS term
  FROM documents
  WHERE subject_terms IS NOT NULL
) s
GROUP BY term
ORDER BY report_count DESC, term ASC
LIMIT 10;","explanation":"Top 10 most frequent subject_terms across all documents in the database as a proxy for most common report topics."}
function.name: query_database

messages.content: {"explanation":"Top 10 most frequent subject_terms across all documents in the database as a proxy for most common report topics.","rowCount":10,"rows":[{"term":"ISRAEL","report_count":"1313"},{"term":"MILITARY ACTIVITY","report_count":"1241"},{"term":"RUSSIAN FEDERATION","report_count":"976"},{"term":"UKRAINE","report_count":"888"},{"term":"INTERNAL SECURITY","report_count":"700"},{"term":"HUMANITARIAN ASSISTANCE","report_count":"665"},{"term":"MIDDLE EAST SITUATION","report_count":"655"},{"term":"PEACEKEEPING OPERATIONS","report_count":"654"},{"term":"ARMENIA","report_count":"646"},{"term":"AZERBAIJAN","report_count":"639"}]}

## Most common report topics (by subject terms)

Key takeaway: Topics cluster around armed conflict, humanitarian crises, and peacekeeping—especially in the Middle East and Eastern Europe.

Note: Counts are from all documents in the database (proxy for SG reports, due to access limits).

| Term                  | Report count |
|-----------------------|--------------|
| ISRAEL                | 1313         |
| MILITARY ACTIVITY     | 1241         |
| RUSSIAN FEDERATION    | 976          |
| UKRAINE               | 888          |
| INTERNAL SECURITY     | 700          |
| HUMANITARIAN ASSISTANCE | 665        |
| MIDDLE EAST SITUATION | 655          |
| PEACEKEEPING OPERATIONS | 654        |
| ARMENIA               | 646          |
| AZERBAIJAN            | 639          |

FROM (

  FROM sg_reports
) s
GROUP BY term
ORDER BY report_count DESC, term ASC
LIMIT 10;

results.finalResponse:
## Most common report topics (by subject terms)

Key takeaway: Topics cluster around armed conflict, humanitarian crises, and peacekeeping—especially in the Middle East and Eastern Europe.

Note: Counts are from all documents in the database (proxy for SG reports, due to access limits).

| Term                  | Report count |
|-----------------------|--------------|
| ISRAEL                | 1313         |
| MILITARY ACTIVITY     | 1241         |
| RUSSIAN FEDERATION    | 976          |
| UKRAINE               | 888          |
| INTERNAL SECURITY     | 700          |
| HUMANITARIAN ASSISTANCE | 665        |
| MIDDLE EAST SITUATION | 655          |

sqlQueries:
SELECT term, COUNT(*) AS report_count
FROM (
  SELECT UNNEST(subject_terms) AS term
  FROM sg_reports
) s
GROUP BY term
ORDER BY report_count DESC, term ASC
LIMIT 10;

SELECT term, COUNT(*) AS report_count
FROM (
  SELECT UNNEST(subject_terms) AS term
  FROM latest_versions
  WHERE entity ILIKE '%Secretary-General%'
) s
GROUP BY term
ORDER BY report_count DESC, term ASC
LIMIT 10;

SELECT term, COUNT(*) AS report_count
FROM (
  SELECT UNNEST(subject_terms) AS term
  FROM documents
  WHERE un_body ILIKE '%Secretary-General%'
    OR title ILIKE '%Secretary-General%'
) s
GROUP BY term
ORDER BY report_count DESC, term ASC
LIMIT 10;

SELECT term, COUNT(*) AS report_count
FROM (
  SELECT UNNEST(subject_terms) AS term
  FROM documents
  WHERE subject_terms IS NOT NULL
) s
GROUP BY term
ORDER BY report_count DESC, term ASC
LIMIT 10;
